content: कृत्रिम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृत्या निर्मितं; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. IV. 4. 20</ls>] {@--1@} Artificial, fictitious, not spontaneous, acquired; °मित्रं, °शत्रुः &c.; <ls>R. 13. 75</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 17.</ls> {@--2@} Adopted (as a child); see below. --मः , °पुत्रः {@--1@} an artificial or adopted son; one of the 12 kinds of sons recognised by the Hindu law; he is a grown up son adopted without the consent of his natural parents; <ab>cf.</ab> कृत्रिमः स्यात्स्वयं कृतः <ls>Y. 2. 131</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also <ls>Ms. 9. 169.</ls> {@--2@} Incense, olibanum. {@--3@} Benzoin. --मं {@--1@} A kind of salt. {@--2@} A kind of perfume.
